title: Achieving efficient urea electrosynthesis through improving the coverage of a crucial intermediate across a broad range of nitrate concentrations
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01878H, Paper
Yaodong Yu, Yuyao Sun, Jiani Han, Yujia Guan, Hongdong Li, Lei Wang, Jianping Lai
A novel Ru–Cu9Bi/CNT multi-site alloy is synthesised for electrocatalytic C–N coupling to generate urea across a broad range of NO3− concentrations. By improving the coverage of key intermediate *NHO, ensure the subsequent electrosynthesis of urea.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
